Package com.cloudera.labs.envelope.hbase

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HBaseSerde
    Interface defining methods to convert to/from HBase cells from/to Spark Rows.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultHBaseSerde  
    HBaseColumnsValidation  
    HBaseOutput
    HBase output implementing the RandomOutput and BulkOutput APIs.
    HBaseOutput.BulkHBaseMutatorFunction  
    HBaseSerde.ColumnDef
    Simple Column specification for HBase columns
    HBaseSerde.RowToDelete
    Function to convert from Row to Delete
    HBaseSerde.RowToPut
    Function to convert from Row to Put
    HBaseSerde.RowToQuery
    Function to convert from Row to Query
    HBaseUtils
